channel.title: Advice
channel.description:
This is my main account, the one I have been working on for yonks. I need some advice. Apparently the skills would be close for an excellent pker so from people who have experience in that area, which skills should I be training up and to what level? Here are the current stats:
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/28wnszc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/w2eefm.png[/img]
It has about 6.5m total wealth and money making is quite easy for the levels I have.
Also if anyone wants to train with me, add Asert One. I'm usually in world 77

item.title: Advice
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Alright thanks guys. At the moment i’m concentrating upon Range and Magic and after 80/94 I will begin on combat again.

Read full topic

item.title: Advice
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

What I’d do in your position, is get:

  • 80 attack.
  • 90 Strength.
  • 60 Defence.
  • 70 Prayer (Coupled with the King’s Ransom quest for Piety).
  • 94 Magic (Along with Lunar magicks for Vengeance).

With all that, your account will be pretty sick against almost anyone your level (Around 99-100, depending on how much you level your Hit Points.).

Read full topic

item.title: Advice
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

60 attack, 70 defense, high str, high range, high mage, 70 prayer. The build is called a 60 attack Barrows/ Piety Pker. You are still low enough combat to be able to fight zerkers and low level tanks, but they will have trouble hitting through your defense, plus you will have piety. Here’ s a vid of the build in action, if you can learn the pk style fit for this type of account, your golden.

Read full topic
